name: diepcustom
description: A recreation of diep's physics, protocol, and backend, in Typescript

scripts.server: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.docker:start: docker run -p ${PORT:-8080}:8080 --env PORT=8080 --env ORIGIN_URL --env SERVER_INFO --env APP_KEY --env NODE_ENV --rm --interactive --tty diep-local
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:start
